intent_atoms.description: Provide a tolerant parsing warning ribbon that informs users of parsing issues and allows them to dismiss it.
Bind ParseTreeStore to the tolerant parsing issue metrics stream and reset counters during lifecycle events.
Add CorruptionWarningRibbon SwiftUI component with persisted dismissal state and accessibility copy.
Update AppShellView and DocumentSessionController to present the ribbon, animate transitions, and focus first affected node when tapped.
The ribbon must present in the app shell view and show the warning message.

functional_units.name: Tolerant Parsing Warning Ribbon
functional_units.description: A SwiftUI component that displays a warning ribbon when tolerant parsing issues are detected, persists dismissal state, and provides accessibility copy.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStore Integration
functional_units.description: Binds ParseTreeStore to the tolerant parsing issue metrics stream and resets counters during lifecycle events.

functional_units.name: AppShellView Update
functional_units.description: Updates AppShellView to present the warning ribbon, animate transitions, and focus the first affected node when tapped.

functional_units.name: DocumentSessionController Update
functional_units.description: Adds functionality to DocumentSessionController to handle presentation of the warning ribbon, navigation to first affected node, and integration with integrity diagnostics.
